aboutMe.name: Ali Öztürk Yılmaz
aboutMe.title: Full Stack Developer
aboutMe.description1: I am a passionate developer from Istanbul, Turkey, with a focus on creating high-performing web and mobile applications. My career has been shaped by a dedication to learning new technologies and delivering projects that push the boundaries of what's possible.
aboutMe.description2: From building responsive websites to crafting mobile applications, my experiences range from startup environments to large-scale enterprise solutions. I thrive on finding creative solutions to complex challenges while ensuring that users have a seamless experience.
aboutMe.description3: I am constantly evolving my skills and am driven by the desire to develop innovative products that make a real impact.

whatIDo.title: Web Development
whatIDo.description: Building dynamic websites with modern frameworks and tools, ensuring fast, scalable, and responsive designs.

whatIDo.title: App Development
whatIDo.description: Creating intuitive and high-performance mobile apps, focusing on user experience and feature-rich applications.

whatIDo.title: UI/UX Design
whatIDo.description: Designing user-centric interfaces that prioritize accessibility, usability, and engaging visual design.

whatIDo.title: Database Management
whatIDo.description: Designing and optimizing databases for high availability, scalability, and performance.

whatIDo.title: Freelance Solutions
whatIDo.description: Providing tailored IT solutions and consultancy services to small businesses and individuals.

whatIDo.title: Cloud Computing
whatIDo.description: Building and managing cloud infrastructure to scale and maintain modern applications efficiently.

testimonials.name: Emre Kılıç
testimonials.text: Ali exceeded our expectations with his development work on our mobile app. His deep understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies allowed him to deliver a seamless, high-quality product.

testimonials.name: Alece Nulim
testimonials.text: Ali exceeded our expectations with his development work on our mobile app. His deep understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies allowed him to deliver a seamless, high-quality product.

education.description: Graduated with a Bachelor's in Computer Science, where I developed a passion for software engineering and started contributing to open-source projects.
Currently pursuing a Master's in Computer Engineering, focusing on AI and machine learning to further my expertise in next-generation technologies.

certificate.description: Acquired advanced knowledge of full-stack development, including server-side frameworks and JavaScript optimization.
Completed a certification in designing cloud architectures using AWS tools and services to deploy scalable applications.
Gained in-depth knowledge of UX design principles, including user research, wireframing, and prototyping for mobile apps.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
experience.description: Built and maintained client websites, working closely with teams to ensure a responsive, user-friendly experience. Focused on improving website speed and SEO.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
experience.description: Provide custom software solutions, including web development, app development, and automation for clients across various industries.

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
experience.description: Led the development of scalable software systems, focusing on team collaboration and agile project management.
